General.Name: I-Nexus
General.Description: i-nexus Global plc provides cloud-based strategy execution software that enables large organizations to deploy and execute strategy worldwide. It helps prioritize, align, and manage the projects and actions needed to meet these goals; and real time performance measurement to gauge results and drive continuous improvement. i-nexus Global plc was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Coventry, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 27-28 Eastcastle Street, London, United Kingdom, W1W 8DH
